imgDesc.text: The NRE (Menu 30), or "Nutrition, Ready-to-Eat" to use the full term, is a special item created by a certain alchemist. Completed dishes can be put inside this meal-in-a-pouch, to be ingested quickly under various circumstances. Tap to begin placing food inside.

You may store one type of Restorative and Revival Dish each within the pouch. Once equipped, you may swiftly ingest these foods. Use of the Revival Dish will take priority should there be a party member who is currently down.
